summary: .Ever thought that the blades armor never looked like it was meant to be heavy armor? This is a simple mod that changes the blades armor from heavy to light.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply changes blades armor to be light through a small edit using the creation engine. It should have little to no impact on performance, and
it should be compatible with most mods.

https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41731
(aMidianBorn Blades Armor)
In case you want a more aesthetically pleasing version of the blades armor.
author: TrockenFrosch
